casebody.data:
HOUSE OF RAEFORD FARMS, INC.
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES. No. 301P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015.

The following order has been entered or the motion filed on the 25th of August 2015 by Respondent for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
